date.description: The date of the report data

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign

adGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the ad group

adGroupName.description: The name of the ad group

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number of the purchased product

sku.description: The Stock Keeping Unit of the purchased product

impressions.description: Number of times the ad was displayed

clicks.description: Number of clicks on the ad

purchasedProductSales14d.description: Sales value of purchased products within 14 days

purchasedProductUnits14d.description: Number of purchased product units within 14 days
